title: Premium Cryptocurrency Exchange Feed
description: A visually stunning and premium cryptocurrency exchange interface featuring an infinite scroll feed with rich gradients, colored shadows, and shimmer loading effects.

generation_hints.websocket_implementation: Use socket.io-client for real-time price updates. Connect on mount, subscribe to ticker channel, handle reconnection.
generation_hints.price_formatting: Use decimal.js for precise calculations. Format with Intl.NumberFormat for currency display.
generation_hints.infinite_scroll: Implement with IntersectionObserver. Load next batch when sentinel element is visible.
generation_hints.shimmer_loading: Use CSS animations with gradient backgrounds for premium loading effect.
generation_hints.chart_integration: Use Recharts for sparklines and price charts. Update with real-time data from WebSocket.
generation_hints.state_management: Use Zustand for global state (prices, user data). Use React Query for API data fetching and caching.
generation_hints.performance_optimization: Memoize crypto cards with React.memo. Use virtual scrolling for large lists.
generation_hints.security_best_practices: Never store API keys in client. Use JWT tokens for authentication. Validate all inputs.
